casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Didlick.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Didlick (1993), 67 Ohio St.3d 75.]

(No. 93-454 Submitted April 20, 1993 Decided August 11, 1993.) *76J. Warren Bettis, Disciplinary Counsel, and Harald F. Craig III, Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. *77 Per Curiam.

We agree with the board’s findings and recommendation. Accordingly, we indefinitely suspend respondent from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
